effect.dragonsurvival.stress.description: Applied to forest dragons who remain too long in the dark. Removes all satiation, and quickly depletes hunger.
effect.dragonsurvival.royal_chase.descri: Those who attack royalty and their friends are marked. Villagers will avoid those with this mark, and hunters will follow and attack. Can be removed by the Hero of the Village effect.  If the mark will last longer than 20 minutes, the duration is hidden.
effect.dragonsurvival.trapped.descriptio: This net prevents you from escaping into the sky.
effect.dragonsurvival.fire.description: Protects cave dragons from the damaging effects of water.
effect.dragonsurvival.animal_peace.descr: Animals will not flee from dragons with this effect active.
effect.dragonsurvival.water_vision.descr: Like night vision, but only works underwater. Sea dragon buff.
effect.dragonsurvival.lava_vision.descri: Improves visibility in the lava. Cave dragon buff.
effect.dragonsurvival.hunter.description: Forest dragons with this effect are Invisible while standing in tall grass.
effect.dragonsurvival.revealing_the_soul: Multiplies the experience gained from mobs. Sea dragon skill.
effect.dragonsurvival.burn.description: The target takes damage from movement. Suffered by victims of Cave dragon attack.
effect.dragonsurvival.charged.descriptio: Produces arcs of electricity, damaging everything nearby.
effect.dragonsurvival.drain.description: Forest dragons produce this poisonous gas. Plants will grow when exposed to their breath, while most other things will have their life drained.
effect.dragonsurvival.strong_leather.des: Additional armor points. The Cave dragon AOE buff.
effect.dragonsurvival.wings_cave.descrip: Wings of the Cave dragon. You can change your flight toggle button in options.
effect.dragonsurvival.wings_forest.descr: Wings of the Forest dragon. You can change your flight toggle button in options.
effect.dragonsurvival.wings_sea.descript: Wings of the Sea dragon. You can change your flight toggle button in options.
effect.dragonsurvival.source_of_magic.de: Gives the dragon inexhaustible mana to use magic.
effect.dragonsurvival.royal_departure.de: Despawns creatures with the royal_departure_affected tag when the effect ends. By default these are princes and princesses.
death.attack.starDrain: %1$s had their life and energy drained by magic.
death.attack.starDrain.player: %1$s had their life and energy drained by magic while trying to escape %2$s.
death.attack.waterBurn.player: %1$s tried to swim in water to escape %2$s.
death.attack.rainBurn: %1$s spent too long in the rain.
death.attack.rainBurn.player: %1$s spent too much time in the rain trying to escape %2$s.
ds.cave_dragon_choice: In the depths of your soul, the lava has began to roar. You have chosen to become a §cCave dragon.§r
ds.forest_dragon_choice: You feel the need for raw meat, and are covered in grassy scales. You have chosen to become a §aForest dragon.§r
ds.sea_dragon_choice: The stormy sea and fishes beckon you. You have chosen to become a §3Sea dragon.§r
ds.choice_human: You have awakened from your sleep, and become a Human.
ds.wings.nohunger: Hunger has exhausted you, and you can't fly.
ds.you.have.no.wings: You have §cno wings§r. You need to talk to the Ender dragon, or use the Wing Grant special item.
ds.dragon.grants.wings: <Ender dragon> I bestow wings on you. Now leave, quickly!
ds.space.occupied: You need a 3x3 area to place
ds.cooldown.active: The altar is on cooldown for: %s
ds.invalid_grow_item: §6You need another type of growth artifact:§r %1$s
ds.gui.tab_button.2: If you have any questions about Dragon Survival, visit the Github Wiki!
ds.help.altar:
§6■ Welcome to Dragon Survival!§r
■ You can choose which type of dragon you want to become, each with pros and cons. Check the help to learn more.§r
§r■§7 This decision is not permanent, but you may lose progress if you change your mind.§r
§r■§7 Don't forget to delete old configs if you update our mod to avoid bugs! Enjoy the game! :3
ds.help.customization:
■ Good, you chose a dragon species! Now it's time to §6customize§r your dragon. You can select different components, and change their color freely.

■ Editing your appearance will not affect your growth, and any changes you make here will be §6saved§r, even if you accidentally close the editor. You can use the Preset slots on the right to save different appearances.

■ If you don't know where to start, use the "§6randomize§r" button on the top right.§r

§r-§7 Shaders can affect the result. This is especially noticeable on glowing textures.§r
§r-§7 The texture from this editor is only visible if your custom skins are turned off. You can learn how to create your own custom skins on Wiki or on our discord server.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.size_info: You can also change the visual §6size§r of the dragon slightly, but it won't affect the hitbox size in any way.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.default_skin.toolti: If you are using a §6texture pack§r to test your custom skin before submitting it, check this box.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.wings.tooltip: Visual only. Not available for Western and Central body types.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.copy: Click here to copy your current settings to the other growth stages.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.save_slot: You can select any slot here and the result will be automatically saved.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.confirm.all:
With your current config settings all progress will be lost when you change.

Would you still like to continue?
ds.gui.dragon_editor.confirm.ability:
With your current config settings your growth progress will be lost when you change.

Would you still like to continue?
ds.gui.dragon_editor.confirm.growth:
With your current config settings your ability progress will be lost when you change.

Would you still like to continue?
dragonsurvival:config.category.general.t: General config options for Dragon Survival
ds.endmessage.1: Have you come here for the flight spin ability, %s? You should leave, before it's too late.
ds.endmessage.2: This is my land, %s, show some respect. Why have you come here? Do you seek the flight spin ability?
ds.endmessage.3: You have gone through a lot to get here, %s. What do you wish for?
ds.altar_dragon_info.cave_dragon:
§c■ Cave dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r fire resistance, pickaxe claws, fire magic, faster movement on stone and firey blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r water.
§6■ Ration:§r
%s
ds.altar_dragon_info.forest_dragon:
§a■ Forest dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r soft fall, axe claws, poison magic, faster movement on wooden and grass blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r dark caves.
§6■ Ration:§r
%s
ds.altar_dragon_info.sea_dragon:
§3■ Sea dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r underwater breathing, shovel claws, electric magic, faster movement on ice and beach blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r dry air.
§6■ Ration:§r
%s
ds.altar_dragon_info.human:
■ §nHuman.§r
■ Homo sapiens.§r
Travelers, builders, and creators.
ds.skill.help_1:
■ §6Active skills§r are used in combat.
- §9Skill power§r scales off your current experience level. The higher your EXP level, the stronger your active skills.
- §9Experience or mana§r points are used to cast spells.
- §9Controls§r - check in-game Minecraft control settings! You can drag and drop skill icons around.
ds.skill.help_1_alt:
■ §6Active skills§r are used in combat.
- §9Experience or mana§r points are used to cast spells.
- §9Controls§r - check in the game settings! You can drag and drop skill icons around.
ds.skill.help_2:
■ §aPassive skills§r are upgraded by spending experience levels.
- §9Mana§r - do not forget use the Source of Magic and Dragons Treats for an infinite supply of mana!
- §9More information§r can be found on our Wiki and in our Discord. Check the Curseforge mod page.
ds.skill.help_2_alt:
■ §aPassive skills§r can be upgraded permanently, unlike Active skills.
- §9Mana§r - do not forget to use the Source of Magic and Dragons Treats for an infinite supply of mana!
- §9More information§r can be found on our Wiki and in our Discord. Check the Curseforge mod page.
ds.skill.help_3: ■ §dInnate skills§r are a dragon's quirks, the pros and cons of your species. They mostly play an informational role, and cannot be removed.
ds.skill.help.claws:
■ This is the §6dragon inventory§r.
§7■ Differences from the vanilla inventory: a 3x3 crafting grid, an expanded window where your whole dragon fits, a toggleable claw panel, and an item sorting button.§r
■ A dragon is §6born§r with strong claws and teeth, but you can make them even better! Just put §6any tools§r§f here in your claw slots and your bare paw will borrow their aspect as long as they are intact.
§7■ Does not stack with «Claws and Teeth» skill, which only applies if these slots are empty.
ds.help.source_of_magic:
■ A source of magic can be charged with Elder Dragon items. 
■ Crouch + right click to use.

■ §6+10 sec§r - Elder Dragon Dust
■ §6+50 sec§r - Elder Dragon Bone
■ §6+100 sec§r - Dragon Heart Shard
■ §6+300 sec§r - Weak Dragon Heart
■ §6+1000 sec§r - Elder Dragon Heart
ds.skill.description.storm_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a stream of sparks. Targets become §c«Electrified»§r and deal electric damage to everything nearby. The more targets are affected, the more damage will be dealt.

■ Charges creepers, and during a storm, may summon thunderbolts. 

■ Range depends on the age of the dragon.
ds.skill.description.ball_lightning:
■ Ranged attack: shoots out a condensed ball of electrical energy. Deals damage and §celectrifies§r nearby enemies as it travels.

■ During a thunderstorm, lightning may strike the ball.
ds.skill.description.revealing_the_soul:
■ AOE Buff: temporarily increases amount of §2experience§r gained from monsters. 

■ Has a limit of maximum amount of experience you can gain at a time. Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.sea_eyes:
■ Personal Buff: provides §2Sea Vision§r for a short time.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.sea_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores on wet blocks.

■ Current amount of §2%s§r mana:
 - §2%s§r from «Sea Magic»
 - §2%s§r from level of dragon
 - §2%s§r body type
ds.skill.description.sea_athletics:
■ Standing on some blocks will give you §2Speed %s§r

■ Duration: §2%s§rs
ds.skill.description.water:
■ Increases your capacity for hydration while outside of water. Will help you to survive while venturing onto land, or even in the Nether.

■ Duration: §2%s§rs
ds.skill.description.spectral_impact: ■ Gives a §c%s%%§r chance to make your attack ignore enemy armor.
ds.skill.description.sea_claws_and_teeth:
■ Sea dragons §2can§r deal increased damage and dig loose blocks without tools. They grow stronger with age.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses, or use certain items.
ds.skill.description.sea_wings:
■ Dragons can use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability. Only one dragon in this world can share this power with you.

■ Enable flight: [%s]
ds.skill.description.sea_wings.has_spin: ■ You are able to §2spin§r while flying or swimming.
ds.skill.description.sea_wings.no_spin: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r while flying or swimming.
ds.skill.description.sea_dragon:
■ Sea dragons are made mostly of water, with a golden skeleton. Their diet includes a variety of seafood, and peaceful animals fear dragons.

■ They have innate immunity to lightning and §2unlimited oxygen§r§7. They feel best in the sea.§r
ds.skill.description.amphibian:
■ Drying out under the harsh sun is a major concern for sea dragons. If they are outside of the water for too long, they will dehydrate and suffer damage.

■ The skill «Water», effect «Sea Peace», rain, ice, snow and water bottles §7could make your life easier.§r

■ Damage when dehydrated: §c%s per %ss§r
ds.skill.description.poisonous_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a toxic gas that creates a §c«Drain»§r area of effect, which is deadly for creatures, but helps plants grow faster.

■ Range depends on the age of the dragon. Cannot be used while affected by «Stress»."
ds.skill.description.spike: ■ Ranged attack: shoots out sharp §cdarts§r, which fly a large distance to pierce your target. Less effective underwater.
ds.skill.description.inspiration:
■ AOE buff: provides §2Haste III§r to all nearby creatures, increasing your block harvesting speed.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.hunter:
■ Personal buff: Activates the §2Hunter§r effect, which allows you to become invisible in tall grass and increases your movement speed. Your first melee strike will remove this effect and cause a critical hit with a §c%s§r damage bonus.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight. Will be removed early if you take damage, or attack a target.
ds.skill.description.forest_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores under direct sunlight and on grass.

■ Current amount of §2%s§r mana:
 - §2%s§r from «Forest Magic»
 - §2%s§r from level of dragon
 - §2%s§r from body type
ds.skill.description.forest_athletics:
■ Standing on wooden or grassy blocks will give you §2Speed %s§r

■ Duration: §2%s§rs
ds.skill.description.light_in_darkness: ■ Allows you to stay longer in dark areas. Delay before you gain «Stress» while in low light level: §2%ss§r.
ds.skill.description.cliffhanger: Your landing becomes much softer. Safe fall distance: §2%sb§r.
ds.skill.description.forest_claws_and_te:
■ Forest dragons §2can§r deal increased damage, and may chop down trees without tools. They grow stronger with age.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses and use several items.
ds.skill.description.forest_wings:
■ Dragons can use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability. Only one dragon in this world can share this power with you.

■ Enable flight: [%s]
ds.skill.description.forest_wings.has_sp: ■ You are able to §2spin§r while flying or swimming.
ds.skill.description.forest_wings.no_spi: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r while flying or swimming.
ds.skill.description.forest_dragon:
■ Forest dragons have a diamond skeleton, and are composed mostly of predatory plants. Their diet includes raw meat and sweet berries, and most animals fear them.

■ They have innate §2immunity to thorn bushes and cacti§r§7. They feel best on the surface of the Overworld.
ds.skill.description.fear_of_dark:
■ The predatory plants in your body dislike §dDarkness§r. If the light level around you is lower than 4, you may receive the §c«Stress»§r effect, rapidly draining your food gauge.

■ The skill «Light the Dark» and effect «Forest Magic» §7could make your life easier.
ds.description.hot_dragon_rod: ■§7 Rubbing dragon dust into a hot rod produces a very tasty and crispy snack. Generates enough internal heat to allow cave dragons to stay underwater for a short time.
ds.description.explosive_copper: ■§7 Cave dragon dessert. Dangerous and unstable.
ds.description.quartz_explosive_copper: ■§7 A high-pressure heated rattlesnake mixture of quartz and explosive copper is a favored dish of cave dragons. For them, it removes wither and poison effects, and gives Protection and Regeneration.
ds.description.double_quartz: ■§7 By crushing two varieties of quartz between your paws, you can combine them to greatly improves the taste.
ds.description.sweet_sour_rabbit: ■§7 Freshly-caught rabbit is great on its own, but if you marinate it with a spider's eye and honey it makes a terrific dish that you would happily serve during holidays. Cleanses all active effects for forest dragons.
ds.description.luminous_ointment: ■§7 Forest dragons feel physical pain when visiting dark caves, as their own plants begin to devour them. To increase their resistance, these dragons apply a special glowing ointment to their body.
ds.description.diamond_chorus: ■§7 This rare exotic delicacy is prepared in a very interesting way. Whole diamonds are difficult to eat. Forest dragons will process them with Ender Dragon Breath first to crumble them, then scatter the dust into chorus fruits. For forest dragons, it removes wither and poison effects, and gives Protection and Regeneration.
ds.description.smelly_meat_porridge: ■§7 A forest dragon's plants need good nutrition, with this meat and bone fertilizer forming a dietary staple.
ds.description.meat_wild_berries: ■§7 Raw meat always goes well with sweet berries and wild herbs. Any forest dragon will attest to this.
ds.description.meat_chorus_mix: ■§7 The exotic Chorus Fruit has always been prized among forest dragons, and when paired with meat, it gives them Regeneration.
ds.description.seasoned_fish: ■§7 Any raw fish is suitable for this sea dish. First, the skin is removed, and the fish is thickly coated with ink, which is absorbed into the meat, giving it an unusual taste and hue. The kelp leaf is for decoration, and helps keep the fish fresh.
ds.description.golden_coral_pufferfish: ■§7 Before consumption, live coral is pulverized to dust, shaped, and then combined with sliced pufferfish. Infusing gold into the result reduces the dizzying effect, making it safe for consumption. Sea dragons get Regeneration from this dish.
ds.description.frozen_raw_fish: ■§7 Raw ice fish is food and water for sea dragons in one package! Cleanses all effects.
ds.description.golden_turtle_egg: ■§7 This is a rare and valuable dish meant for a sea dragon's table. First, two small holes are made in a turtle egg. Then, the contents are mixed with dragon dust and gold, and then poured back into the egg. After a while, the dust reacts with the eggshell, changing its color and texture. For sea dragons, it removes wither and poison effects, and gives Protection and Regeneration.
ds.description.charred_meat: ■§7 Cave dragons are normally the most vegetarian of all... but this is the exception to the rule.
ds.description.charred_mushroom: ■§7 The pickled mushrooms in this plate are fried, along with the plate, and served as a meal together on cave dragons table.
ds.description.charred_seafood: ■§7 It is very important for a cave dragon to keep as much water as possible out of their food. The more charred, the better!
ds.description.prince_summon: ■§7 The prince sometimes visits towns and villages with his entourage, but you can personally summon him for a short period of time to trade. Prepare swords, flowers and gold in advance. In the final stages sells items to reduce the growth of the dragon. These scrolls can be found in various chests in the world.
ds.description.princess_summon:
■§7 ■§7 Not all royalty condescend to visit ordinary villagers, but that has nothing to do with the Dragon Princesses. They regularly visit villages and towns to trade. They are interested in flowers, gold and rare objects. To the dragons they meet, they sell a variety of food. The princesses are in the service of dragons unknown to anyone and every time they return to them after trading. Stock up on goods before you use the scroll. In the final stages trade unnecessary elder hearts for more useful items.
■ §7Callscrolls can be found in various chests in the world.
ds.skill.description.nether_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a stream of fire that ignites enemies. Sets an area on the surface on fire. Range depends on age of the dragon.

■ Is able to destroy some blocks. Cannot be used under water, and during rain.
ds.skill.description.fireball: ■ Ranged attack: shoots out a fireball that §cexplodes§r and sets the area on fire.
ds.skill.description.strong_leather:
■ AOE buff: provides temporarily increased §2armor§r for all nearby creatures.

■ The effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.lava_vision: ■ Personal buff: makes lava more §2transparent§r while active.
ds.skill.description.cave_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores while standing on hot blocks.

■ Current amount of §2%s§r mana:
 - §2%s§r from «Cave Magic»
 - §2%s§r from level of dragon
 - §2%s§r from body type
ds.skill.description.cave_athletics:
■ Standing on stone surfaces will give you §2Speed %s§r

■ Duration: §2%s§rs
ds.skill.description.contrast_shower:
■ You are resistant to Rain, snow and snowfall for: §2%s§rs

■ Water, potions and snowballs are still dangerous
ds.skill.description.burn:
■ Your target has a %s%% chance to receive the §c«Burned»§r effect from your attacks.

The effect deals damage when the target moves.

The faster the movement, the more damage is done.

■ Creatures with fire resistance are immune to this effect.
ds.skill.description.cave_claws_and_teet:
■ Cave dragons §2can§r deal increased damage, and may mine stone blocks without tools. This ability gets stronger as you grow.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses and use several items.
ds.skill.description.cave_wings:
■ Dragons use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability. Only one dragon in this world can share their power of flight with you.

■ Enable flight: [%s]
ds.skill.description.cave_wings.has_spin: ■ You are able to §2spin§r in air and in lava.
ds.skill.description.cave_wings.no_spin: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r in air and in lava.
ds.skill.description.cave_dragon:
■ Cave dragons have a netherite skeleton, and are made mostly of lava. Their diet includes charred meat and coal. Peaceful animals fear dragons.

■ They have innate §2immunity to fire§r and they feel best in the Nether.
ds.skill.description.hot_blood:
■ Cave dragons take §cdamage from water§r, snow, rain and other liquids due to their fiery nature.

■ The skill «Contrast Shower» and effect «Cave Fire» §7could make your life easier.

■ Damage: §c%s points in %ss§r
ds.description.caveDoor: ■§7 A large door that only a cave dragon may open.
ds.description.forestDoor: ■§7 A large door that only a forest dragon may open.
ds.description.seaDoor: ■§7 A large door that only a sea dragon may open.
ds.description.legacyDoor: ■§7 The very first large door we added to the mod. Just for nostalgia.
ds.description.grayHelmet: ■§7 Poor hunter. Fortunately, you didn't know him.
ds.description.goldHelmet: ■§7 You surely remember that the knight wore dark armor. Where did the golden helmet come from?
ds.description.blackHelmet: ■§7 You should have used the Eye of Innos.
ds.description.dragonBeacon: ■§7 Required to create dragon beacons. Silk touch is required to collect them again. When you craft this item, you will keep the beacon used in its recipe.
ds.description.passivePeaceBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Sea Peace» and «Animal Calm». Best for sea dragons. Peaceful animals stop running away from the dragon. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience. Requires a silk touch.
ds.description.passiveMagicBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Forest Magic» and «Haste». Best for forest dragons. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience. Requires a silk touch.
ds.description.passiveFireBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Cave Fire» and «Sturdy Skin». Gives extra armor. Best for cave dragons. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience. Requires a silk touch.
ds.description.dragonMemoryBlock: ■§7 If set under any dragon beacon, you will passively receive its effect in an area centered on the beacon at no additional cost, but for reduced duration.  You may still activate the beacon to receive the full duration effect.
ds.description.dragonAltar: ■§7 Block to turn into a dragon and decor.
ds.description.elderDragonDust:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 The smallest particle left from an ancient creature, this is used in many dragon crafts. Can be found in ore, treasuries and trade with royalty.
ds.description.elderDragonBone:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 The remains of small dragons that were created from the body of an elder creature that sacrificed itself to save the world, this is used in many dragon crafts.
ds.description.heartElement:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 A fragment from a little dragon's Heart. Ideal for a newborn dragon's growth. Monsters with low durability will rarely drop this when killed.
ds.description.weakDragonHeart:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 Strengthened, but still unstable Heart. Ideal for a young dragon's growth. Some monsters will rarely drop this when killed.
ds.description.elderDragonHeart:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 Heart that is radiant and full of energy. If you listen, you can hear elder voice calling you from the depths. Ideal for an adult dragon's growth. Highly durable monsters will rarely drop this when killed
ds.description.starBone: ■§7 This item slightly reduces the dragon's growth. Sold from the prince and found in chests.
ds.description.starHeart: ■§7 Totally stops the dragon's growth. Repeated use activates growth. Endless. Purchased from a prince.
ds.description.caveDragonTreat: ■§7 Fully restores cave dragon's mana and slightly quenches hunger. Gives the effect of infinite mana.
ds.description.forestDragonTreat: ■§7 Fully restores forest dragon's mana and slightly quenches hunger. Gives the effect of infinite mana.
ds.description.seaDragonTreat: ■§7 Fully restores sea dragon's mana and slightly quenches hunger. Gives the effect of infinite mana.
ds.description.chargedCoal: ■§7 Can be used to melt a large number of items. More profitable than a block of coal. Removes all effects for a cave dragons and saturates.
ds.description.chargedSoup: ■§7 Good food for the cave dragon. Gives the effect "Cave Fire" that protects from the damaging effects of water.
ds.description.wing_grant: ■§7 This item gives your dragon the ability to fly. Can also be used to remove flight.
ds.description.spin_grant: ■§7 This item gives your dragon the ability to spin while flying. Can be used again to remove the flight spin ability. You can change the keybind in control settings.
ds.description.treasures: ■§7 Dragons can sleep and regenerate mana and health very slowly here. To speed up this process, accumulate plenty of treasure. Build your horde with these and show off your wealth!
ds.description.cave_source_of_magic: ■§7 Cave dragons can activate infinite mana here. Damages other creatures.
ds.description.forest_source_of_magic: ■§7 Forest dragons can activate infinite mana here. Damages other creatures.
ds.description.sea_source_of_magic: ■§7 Sea dragons can activate infinite mana here. Damages other creatures.
ds.description.dragon_pressure_plate: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal while any dragon stands on it. It will not activate if a human steps on it.
ds.description.cave_dragon_pressure_plat: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal while a cave dragon stands on it. Can open a cave dragon door, if adjacent to it.
ds.description.forest_dragon_pressure_pl: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal while a forest dragon stands on it. Can open a forest dragon door, if adjacent to it.
ds.description.sea_dragon_pressure_plate: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal while a sea dragon stands on it. Can open a sea dragon door, if adjacent to it.
ds.description.human_pressure_plate: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal only while a human stands on it. Will not activate for dragons.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.yours: ■ This is what §6you§r look like now.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.random: ■ Shows a randomly selected §6other player§r§f who uploaded a skin. You §ccan't use§r§f their appearance for yourself!§7 Only look and admire! >:D
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.help:
■ A §6Skin§r is a self-made texture for your dragon. In this tab, you can disable the display of your skin for your dragon at different stages, as well as skins of other players.
■ Skins are not built in the Dragon Editor, but created using outside tools.
§7■ If you are interested in how to make your own skin or take a commission, use the buttons on the right.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.discord: ■ Join our §6discord server§r!§7 Read the Rules, FAQ and Wiki before you ask anything.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.wiki: ■ This is a link to our §6Wiki§r dedicated to making your own skin!§7 Remember that this will be very difficult, and requires knowledge of graphic editors.
ds.gui.skins.noskin: This author does not have a skin for this stage.
ds.gui.skins.noskin.yours: You do not have a skin for this stage.
ds.gui.claws.rendering: Toggle showing claws and teeth textures on your model.
ds.gui.growth_help:
■ All dragons will gradually grow as time passes, improving their attributes. At certain growth stages, your appearance will change, and your growth will slow. You can use these items to speed up growth:§r
§6■ %s

§7■ A Star Bone will revert your growth slightly, and a Star Heart will completely stop you from growing. The biggest dragons can take other players for a ride!
ds.gui.body_types.center.tooltip:
§6■ Central Type§r
■ Universal inhabitants of all biospheres, and the most common type of dragon.  They are the most balanced type of dragon, having no particular strengths or weaknesses.
§7■ You may change your body type at any time, but you will lose your growth progress. Each type has their own strengths and weaknesses, but the change is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.body_types.north.tooltip:
§6■ Northern Type§r
■ Perfect sea travelers, conquering both water and air, they are slower on the ground and weaker physically, but are magically adept and excel at swimming. Their flat bodies allow them to go places other dragons cannot!
§7■ You may change your body type at any time, but you will lose your growth progress. Each type has their own strengths and weaknesses, but the change is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.body_types.east.tooltip:
§6■ Eastern Type§r
■ Adapted to life in caves, they lack wings, reducing the effectiveness of their levitation magic, but they are still excellent swimmers. They have a larger supply of mana, and natural armor.
§7■ You may change your body type at any time, but you will lose your growth progress. Each type has their own strengths and weaknesses, but the change is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.body_types.south.tooltip:
§6■ Southern Type§r
■ They are adapted to life on the plains, capable of running swiftly, and leaping high into the air. The special structure of their paws gives them many advantages on the ground, and they are physically strong, but they will struggle at flight and swimming.
§7■ You may change your body type at any time, but you will lose your growth progress. Each type has their own strengths and weaknesses, but the change is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.body_types.west.tooltip:
§6■ Western Type§r
■ Conquerors of mountain and sky, they are unrivalled in their element, but are rather clumsy on the ground.
§7■ You may change your body type at any time, but you will lose your growth progress. Each type has their own strengths and weaknesses, but the change is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.altar.can_still_use:
You didn't make your initial choice in the Dragon Altar.
You may still open the altar in your inventory.
